card.name: CW01 Bloodshed Medic
card.text: Flash Deplete (When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a permanent.) When CW01 Bloodshed Medic depletes a permanent, target creature gains hexproof until end of turn. (This creature can’t be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: CW02 Southern Rallier
card.text: 1W, T, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Citizen creature token.

card.name: CW03 Secluded Firstborn
card.text: Collapse (When you play this card, create The Collapse emblem if it doesn’t exist yet.) When CW03 Secluded Firstborn enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. After The Collapse, transform CW03 Secluded Firstborn. --- (Back): La Creatura

card.name: La Creatura
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose one life. --- (Front): CW03 Secluded Firstborn

card.name: CW04 Spirit of Retribution
card.text: First strike When CW04 Spirit of Retribution enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards from graveyards.

card.name: CW05 Escaped Soldier
card.text: Vigilance Detach 1 (When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may put 1 -1/-1 counters on it and create a 1/1 colorless Spirit Construct artifact creature token.)

card.name: CW07 Veteran of War
card.text: Collapse (When you play this card, create The Collapse emblem if it doesn’t exist yet.) When CW07 Veteran of War enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Citizen creature token. When CW07 Veteran of War dies after The Collapse, return it to the battlefield transformed. --- (Back): That MF Thang

card.name: That MF Thang
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is a Soldier in addition to its other types. Equip 2 --- (Front): CW07 Veteran of War

card.name: CW08 Divine Vindication
card.text: CW08 Divine Vindication deals 3 damage to target attacking creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: CW10 Chained Whelp
card.text: Flying Collapse (When you play this card, create The Collapse emblem if it doesn’t exist yet.) 4W: Creatures you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only after The Collapse.

card.name: CW11 Returning Force
card.text: Flying 4WW, Exile CW11 Returning Force from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 colorless Spirit Construct artifact creature tokens.

card.name: CW12 Soul Purge
card.text: As an additional cost to cast CW12 Soul Purge, discard a card or sacrifice a permanent. Exile target artifact, enchantment, or creature.

card.name: CW13 Ring Outrider
card.text: Collapse (When you play this card, create The Collapse emblem if it doesn’t exist yet.) This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn. When CW13 Ring Outrider enters the battlefield after The Collapse, draw a card.

card.name: CW14 Overwhelming Push
card.text: Collapse (When you play this card, create The Collapse emblem if it doesn’t exist yet.) Choose one. You may instead choose both after The Collapse: • Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance. • Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: UW01 Compeller of the Ring
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from the graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: CU01 Skirmisher Drone
card.text: Flying Whenever CU01 Skirmisher Drone attacks, mill a card. When CU01 Skirmisher Drone dies, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: CU07 Tagal’s Apprentice
card.text: Deplete (When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a permanent.) Whenever CU07 Tagal’s Apprentice depletes a permanent, create a 1/1 colorless Construct creature token. Create two if that permanent was an artifact or land.

card.name: CU10 A Wall
card.text: Defender When CU10 A Wall enters the battlefield, scry 1.

card.name: CB01 Night Watch
card.text: Collapse (When you play this card, create The Collapse emblem if it doesn’t exist yet.) 1B, Discard a card: Search your library for a card named CB01 Night Watch and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library. After The Collapse, CB01 Night Watch gets +1/+0.

card.name: CB02 Sniper Drone
card.text: Flash When CB02 Sniper Drone enters the battlefield, mill three cards, then target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: CB03 Ruthless Apprentice
card.text: Lifelink B, Sacrifice a permanent: CB03 Ruthless Apprentice Gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It gains flying if that permanent was an artifact.

card.name: CB05 Tax Base
card.text: When CB05 Tax Base dies, create two Treasure tokens (They’re artifacts with “T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)

card.name: CB06 Artillery Drone
card.text: Flying Detach 1 (When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may put 1 -1/-1 counters on it and create a 1/1 colorless Spirit Construct artifact creature token.) When CB06 Artillery Drone enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: CB08 Unyielding Man
card.text: Menace Whenever CB08 Unyielding Man attacks, you may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, CB08 Unyielding Man gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it was an artifact, you gain 3 life.

card.name: CB12 Die Forgotten
card.text: Exile target creature. Mill three cards.

card.name: CB14 Suburban Rites
card.text: As an additional cost to cast CB14 Suburban Rites, sacrifice a creature or an artifact. You draw two cards and gain 2 life.

card.name: CB15 Dread-Source Fires
card.text: Choose one: • Exile up to two target creature cards from a graveyard. • Exile up to two target creature tokens.

card.name: UB01 Cast Into Darkness
card.text: Distribute five -1/-1 counters among creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Tagal’s Prefect
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you sacrificed a permanent this turn, draw a card. Draw two if that permanent was an artifact. UB, Sacrifice a permanent: Scry 2.

card.name: Mistvault Bridge
card.text: Mistvault Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. Indestructible T: Add U or B.

card.name: Tainted Isle
card.text: T: Add C. T: Add U or B. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.
